Title: Budgeteer
Description:
Budgeteer - Definition from the Merriam-Webster Online Dictionary:

1  : one who prepares a budget   
2  : one who is restricted to a budget  

A simple Silverlight application intended to assist in preparing a family budget. 
It parses a credit card transaction file and automates categorization of the charges.

Project Description
